snippet: Thousands gathered for an information session organized by advocacy groups offering unauthorized immigrants assessments of whether they meet the requirements to apply to stay in the United States.
abstract: Thousands of illegal immigrants attend information session in Los Angeles organized by advocacy groups offering people assessments of whether they meet requirements to apply to stay in United States; day becomes kind of coming-out party for illegal immigrants, largest gathering of people who may quality for temporary protection from deportation since Pres Obama signed executive action in November.
lead_paragraph: Thousands gathered for an information session organized by advocacy groups offering unauthorized immigrants assessments of whether they meet the requirements to apply to stay in the United States.

headline.main: Undocumented Immigrants Line Up for Door Opened by Obama
headline.print_headline: Immigrants Line Up, Hoping to Reach Door Opened by Obama
